#' @references
#' McCree, K. J. Significance of Enhancement for Calculations Based on the Action Spectrum for Photosynthesis.
#' Plant Physiology, 1972, 49, 704-706. Fig. 1, AMARANTH
#'
#' @title
#' Action spectrum for whole-leaf photosynthesis of amaranth
#'
#' @description
#' The 'classical' action spectra of K. J. McCree (1972)
#' Amaranthus edulis Speg. var. UCD 1966 was used for this data set.
#' Response is net CO2 uptake measured of leaf sections after about 2 minutes measurement time
#' at each wavelength. Light source was a xenon-arc lamp fitted with a monochromator.
#' Irradiance was in the range 10 to 15 W m$^{-2}$.
#' @name McCree_amaranth.spct
#' @note Digitised from bitmap
#'
w.length          s.e.response
